dream_sequence: ^It was one of those dreams again. A child's voice, similar to yours. In a conversation you don't even remember having with... another child, almost the same age as you.
only_child: ^You don't particularly recall being around children your age when you were younger, specially since you lived in a small town. You often played alone to soothe your own boredom.
oldest: ^You were used to being the oldest kid in the bunch, it was difficult finding children who were the same age and shared your struggles in looking after your own siblings early on. You don't particularly recall being around children your age since you lived in a small town.
middle: ^Being the kid who had both an older and younger sibling, it was hard to relate to anyone at home. You don't particularly recall being around children your age when you were younger, specially since you lived in a small town.
youngest: ^You were more used to being around kids older than you, being the youngest in your family. Adults have treated you well, even your older siblings. All in which gave you a hard time relating to kids that were closer to your age.
